DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of A Novel Breast Compression Paddle For Wire Localization In Mammography

When technologist use paddle , must carefully position breast rectangular open region wire localization . A novel paddle develop increase wire localization access area tremendously therefore make easy perform procedure . The purpose study evaluate functionality new compression paddle .
